Meena 
Oracle Fusion HCM Consultant 
Permanent Resident-No Sponsorship needed 
Meenap3836@gmail.com 
(971)-427-7166 
 
Professional Summary: 
 
• Seasoned professional with experience in Oracle Fusion HCM Cloud Applications and Oracle 
E Business Suite – HRMS modules. 
• Around 9+ Years of experience in Human Resource management systems, Oracle E-business 
suite 11i to R12 and Oracle fusion Human capital management cloud application. 
• Expertise in Fusion HCM offerings- Core HR, Payroll, Goal and Performance and Absence 
Management. 
• Experience in working on Project Implementation, Configuration, Upgrades, Production 
Support and Change Management process. 
•  Knowledge on Initial setups and defining common application configurations during Global HR 
and Payroll implementation. 
• Experience in HCM extracts, HCM data loader (HDL) and BIP Reports in Oracle Fusion 
HCM.  
• Involved in Complete Lifecycle implementation involving Requirements gathering, Business

• Experience in HCM extracts, HCM data loader (HDL) and BIP Reports in Oracle Fusion 
HCM.  
• Involved in Complete Lifecycle implementation involving Requirements gathering, Business 
Process Re-engineering, Configuration, Development, Troubleshooting, Training, and 
Production support. 
• Hands-on configuration experience working with functional set up manager across Fusion 
Modules. 
• Running Oracle Payroll processes like Quick Pay, Standard Payroll, Payment Distribution, 
Pay slip Configuration. 
• Experienced in all stages of project management, system development, functional 
implementation, support, and customization. 
• Configured Legal Employers, Tax Reporting Units, Payroll Statutory units, Payrolls, 
Earning Elements, Supplemental Earnings, Voluntary & Involuntary Deductions, Pre-Tax 
elements, Employer Liabilities, etc. 
• Excellent ability to learn and deliver in a very short period and ability to work on multiple 
projects and excellent communications skills.

• Excellent ability to learn and deliver in a very short period and ability to work on multiple 
projects and excellent communications skills. 
• Excellent experience in Data loading into Oracle HCM Cloud using HCM Data Loader and HSDL. 
• Good leadership and communication skills, on time deliveries, multi-tasking and assisting clients 
in the selection, implementation planning, fit/gap (As Is – To Be analysis) with alternative 
solutions for product limitations.,  
• Defined Banks, Bank branches, Bank accounts and Payment methods in Payroll. 
• Excellent ability to learn and deliver assignments in a given time frame and ability to work on 
multiple projects with excellent communications skills. 
• Extensively involved in Enterprise level design sessions and helped in HR and Payroll one-time 
setups and involved in third party integration to and from Cloud HCM. 
• Excellent track record for meeting deadlines and submitting deliverables on time.

setups and involved in third party integration to and from Cloud HCM. 
• Excellent track record for meeting deadlines and submitting deliverables on time. 
• Excellent problem solving, decision making, communication and interpersonal skills. 
• Experience in Oracle HCM (EBS/Fusion), including workflow and alerts, PL/SQL and testing 
phases.

• Experienced in Oracle EBS R12 Core HR and Payroll modules’ configuration and production 
support. 
 
 
Education: 
• Master of Business Management 
• Bachelors in computer science. 
 
TECHNOLOGY: 
• Specialization: Oracle HCM Cloud, Oracle EBS (HRMS) and Payroll 
• HCM Cloud/Fusion Offerings: Workforce deployment (Global HR, Global Payroll, Absence 
Management) 
• EBS HRMS Modules: Core HR, Oracle Payroll, Absence Management, Employee and Manager 
Self Service 
• Other Tools: SQL Developer, Forms Data Loader 
• Excel skills: Advanced in MS Excel including PivotTables, VLOOKUP, Task automation using 
macros and VBA, building formulas, managing large datasets with functions: IF, SUM, INDEX, 
MATCH, VLOOKUP, Building charts and graphs. 
• Ticketing Tools: Jira, Service Now, Helpdesk 
 
 
Professional Experience 
Advantage IT INC, Hillsboro, OR 
Client: Reiter Affiliated Companies     May 2021 - Present 
Location: Oxnard, California  
Role: ORACLE FUSION HCM CLOUD CONSULTANT

Professional Experience 
Advantage IT INC, Hillsboro, OR 
Client: Reiter Affiliated Companies     May 2021 - Present 
Location: Oxnard, California  
Role: ORACLE FUSION HCM CLOUD CONSULTANT   
 
Responsibilities:               
• Working as implementation consultant for Oracle Fusion HCM implementation projects. 
• Leading the team to design and develop various critical interfaces for Global HR, Talent 
Management and Payroll. 
• Worked on Data loading/Conversions using HCM Data Loader (HSDL) which includes the 
Workforce Structure Data, Worker Data, Work Relationship Data, Salary, Jobs, and Locations. 
• Built Custom Security to Cloud (Fusion) HCM which includes Create/Modify Data Roles and its 
Security Profiles, Job Roles, Application Roles, and Duty Roles. 
• Developed HCM Extracts analytics for Global HR, compensation, and Performance modules. 
• Experienced in Requirements gathering, Design & Unit Testing to validate product functionality.

• Developed HCM Extracts analytics for Global HR, compensation, and Performance modules. 
• Experienced in Requirements gathering, Design & Unit Testing to validate product functionality. 
• Experienced in understanding business requirements and developing effective configuration 
solutions. Configured various levels of employee and manager portraits and dashboards. 
• Worked on  HCM Extracts for Global HR to validate employee data using existing subject areas. 
• Worked on BI reports/OTBI in Oracle Fusion Cloud and scheduled the report to be delivered to 
Email and FTP.

• Responsible for successful testing of developed solutions including User Acceptance Testing and 
working with the users to validate the solution. 
• Participated in business process workshops and provided business consulting support. 
• Developing project plan and delivering in line with Fusion Implementation Road map and 
Methodology. 
• Working as an Oracle Fusion subject matter expert providing best-practice guidance on HCM 
business processes. 
• Production Support after Go-Live. 
• Worked closely with clients to implement Global HR modules by identifying and addressing 
client needs 
 
 
CVS Caremark 
Dallas, TX                        May 2019 – April 2021  
Oracle HCM Functional Consultant 
 
Responsibilities: 
• Worked as Functional Consultant in implementing Global HR, Payroll and Absence management. 
• Organized  CRP1,  CRP2,  UAT  test  cycles  for Global  HR, Payroll and Absence  Management  
implementation.

• Organized  CRP1,  CRP2,  UAT  test  cycles  for Global  HR, Payroll and Absence  Management  
implementation. 
• Worked on Data loading/Conversions using HCM Data Loader (HSDL) which includes the Workforce 
Structure Data, Worker Data, Work Relationship Data, Salary, Jobs, and Locations. 
• Successfully led  full project lifecycles for Oracle Cloud Payroll and  Absence Management modules, 
ensuring on-time and within-budget delivery. 
• Collaborated closely with Public Sector clients to understand their unique requirements, tailoring 
Oracle Cloud solutions to meet their specific needs. 
• Conducted comprehensive business process assessments, identifying areas for improvement and 
implementing optimizations to enhance efficiency. 
• Managed system integration efforts, working with cross-functional teams to integrate Oracle Cloud 
modules with existing systems and databases. 
• Oversaw data migration activities, ensuring the secure and accurate transfer of data from legacy

modules with existing systems and databases. 
• Oversaw data migration activities, ensuring the secure and accurate transfer of data from legacy 
systems to Oracle Cloud. 
• Provided expert guidance and support to end-users through comprehensive training sessions and 
ongoing assistance. 
• Acted as the primary liaison between the client and internal teams, fostering strong client 
relationships and ensuring their satisfaction. 
• Conducted regular project status meetings, keeping stakeholders informed of progress, issues, and 
resolutions. 
• Played a key role in quality assurance and testing activities, ensuring that Oracle Cloud solutions 
met all requirements and standards. 
• Assisted in the development of project documentation, including project plans, timelines, and 
deliverables.

• Created  different Flex  fields,  document  of  records,  lookups  and  value  sets  based  on  client 
requirement. 
• Worked closely with the HR and management teams to understand the organization's absence 
management requirements, such as identifying the types of leaves, accrual policies, approval 
workflows, and reporting needs. 
• Involved in setting up absence plans, leave types, accrual rules, and defining how absences are 
tracked and managed in the system. 
• Worked on system Integration, testing, Documentation, and user support. 
• Performed balance adjustments to correct employee payroll balance. 
• Build Custom Security to Cloud HCM like creating /modifying Data Roles, Job Roles and Security 
Profiles. 
• Performed setup’s for payroll like loading payroll definition, Managed calculation cards, managed 
banks, and branches. 
• Created different user test cases and user manuals to assist the business users. 
• Trained super users on oracle payroll business operations.

banks, and branches. 
• Created different user test cases and user manuals to assist the business users. 
• Trained super users on oracle payroll business operations. 
 
 
 
 
Client: Mirantis         May 2017-April 2019 
Location: Austin, TX                   
Role: Oracle HCM Functional Consultant 
 
Responsibilities:  
 
• Worked as Lead HCM Functional Consultant on Fusion HCM Implementation for Global HR and 
US Payroll module. 
• Lead the Data Conversion of all Payroll Objects from EBS on premise to Cloud HCM. 
• Extracting the data of all Payroll Objects using complex SQL queries from Oracle EBS on premise 
for migration to Oracle Cloud. 
• Implemented Global HR module in Oracle Cloud HCM by gathering requirements, preparing 
Questionnaire, conducting multiple SIT sessions with the business users. 
• Lead testing team for Integration testing between Cloud HCM and EBS. 
• Validating the data migrated to Oracle Cloud by extracting the data from Cloud HCM using HCM

• Lead testing team for Integration testing between Cloud HCM and EBS. 
• Validating the data migrated to Oracle Cloud by extracting the data from Cloud HCM using HCM 
Extracts and comparing it with the data extracted from EBS using VLOOKUP. 
• Troubleshoot various issues in Oracle Payroll system by assisting the business users in Check 
Writer, Payroll process, Deposit Advice, Sick Balance, Vacation Balance etc., 
• Configuring custom Workflow routing rules for all Manager Self-services and Employee Self-
services with help of Area Responsibilities 
• Performed setups for payroll like loading payroll definition, Managed calculation cards, managed 
banks, and branches. 
• Worked on setting up Approvals for Global HR, Payroll, Absence management and Time and 
Labor. 
• Used outbound interfaces like BIP and HCM extracts to generate reports for third party vendors.

• Managed payroll definitions, setting up costing, worked with predefined and user defined Fast 
Formulas. 
• Loaded Core HR data and Payroll data using HDL, PBL and SSL from downstream to upstream. 
• Created different user test cases and user manuals to assist business users. 
• Trained super users on oracle payroll business operations. 
 
 
 
Client: Blue Star Infotech                         Jul 2014 to Mar 2016 
Location: Bangalore, India                    
Role: Oracle EBS Consultant 
 
Responsibilities: 
• Worked as Oracle EBS consultant for implementing and supporting Oracle R12 Core HR, Payroll, 
Compensation Work Bench, Absence Management, Oracle Incentive Compensation. 
• Participated in workshops with HR, Payroll, HRIT teams to analyze the existing system. 
• Involved in gathering requirements for Open Enrollment Cycle 
• Created programs, plans, plan types, options, rates, coverages, and eligibility criteria for the new

• Involved in gathering requirements for Open Enrollment Cycle 
• Created programs, plans, plan types, options, rates, coverages, and eligibility criteria for the new 
Benefit objects for upcoming plan year during Open Enrollment. 
• Performed Testing for various Benefit Plans during Open Enrollment. 
• Coordinated with the Business users for UAT using Benefit Admin Center. 
• Created Test plans and Test cases for testing Open Enrollment process including Benefit Admin 
Center and Employee Self Service. 
• Implemented based on different geographic areas. 
• Involved in Setup Oracle HR, Benefits and AM for Demo. 
• Production Support after Go-Live. 
• Analyzed business requirements for HR, CWB and OTL modules. 
• Setup Key Flex fields for Job, Position, Grade, People Group, Cost Allocation flex fields. 
• Setup Plan Types, Plans, and Options for Compensation Work bench module. 
• Gathered requirements for participation eligibility for Bonus and Stock plans.

• Setup Plan Types, Plans, and Options for Compensation Work bench module. 
• Gathered requirements for participation eligibility for Bonus and Stock plans. 
• Extracted and loaded data using Web ADI and created test cases for UAT. 
• Responsible for implementing the modules through different instances. 
• Coordinate with technical team for developing concurrent programs for custom reports, payroll 
and benefit extracts. 
• Involved in setting up Paid Time off (PTO) Accruals in Absence Management. 
• Prepare end user manuals for HR, Benefits and Payroll teams. 
• Document BR 100, MD 50, BP080, BR030, TE040 test plans, test scripts and functional specs.

• Building compliance reports like EEO reports.

• Worked in the implementation team for the recruiting module.
